item.description:
Welcome to Chap XVI of this Nerd Fun snob endeavor, in the heart of intellectual snobbery, Harvard Sq. Be there or be Sq.


The rough definition of decadence = over-indulgence, intemperance, invariably leading to moral decline. It is a very volatile term in these times of the stock market bubble etc. It is the assumption that things are OK & that is to be taken for granted; & there will be no end to abundance & prosperity. Rousseau (in Emile) even says that art is decadent.

The opposite, which we could call Spartanism presupposes minimalism is the ideal, because nothing is not at risk and we must be ever-prepared for the worst; & such is to be considered, to Spartans, the norm, which, by way of their self-imposed lifestyles, they routinely practiced self-mortification, including by the consumption of "black soup":
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_soup

Note= Legal Sea Foods Patio is refreshing on a hot day (there is early shade) but can be chilly on a cool day so bring an extra shirt. At both Legal Sea Foods patio and Grendel's seems there is no pressure to order food.

Legal Seafoods patio = a "raw bar" style place, & does offer limited draft beer. This patio is directly in front of the LOWER LEVEL of the Charles Hotel main entrance. It is NOT the same as the upscale restaurant located nearby on the upper level.

You don't have to be a genuine Intellectual snob to join. Pseudo-intellectuals are also welcome. All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony and some baffling intellectual ideas or--dare I say it--some unanswered question you wish to convey incognito.

The premise = to share your intellectual baffling snob idea or question on a name tag (provided) and attach such tag to your shirt, OR chuck such idea or question in a basket in our midst which will be provided and passed around (please pass it around!).

Once this deed is done, pluck from the basket & discuss, if appropriate. This may lead to much laughter, but others may be baffled & perhaps enlightened.

Humor in good taste: ALLOWED. Intellectual apparel: allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, periwig, or monocle. Fold-up sunglasses, corduroy jackets w/ elbow patches: allowed. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes please. Absinthe is not served.

Please bring cash. Please feel free to exchange seats, no one needs to get stuck in one place.

When settling the tab, make sure and add 25% of what you are spending for tax and gratuity!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the LOWER PATIO in front of the main entrance of the Charles Hotel.
item.name: Intellectual Snob Meetup Chap XVI. Decadence
